1000001354.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
1000001354.description: The film chronicles Milkha Singh's, aka The Flying Sikh's, incredible struggle - from being an orphan to becoming one of India's greatest athletes.

1000057225.title: The Dirty Picture
1000057225.description: An overnight sensation, Reshma earns success, fame and a name - Silk. However, what starts as a dream soon turns into a nightmare.

1000090704.title: Neerja
1000090704.description: A biopic on the brave Neerja Bhanot, the head purser had sacrificed her life for the safety of her passengers when terrorists hijacked Pan Am Flight 73.

1000160650.title: Hawaizaada
1000160650.description: Inspired by true events. Set in the era of British India, Shivkar Bapuji Talpade, a school drop-out, constructed India's first unmanned plane.

1000162617.title: MS Dhoni: The Untold Story
1000162617.description: A tell-all tale about the life and times of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, mapping his journey; from a ticket collector to a celebrated cricketer.

1000164358.title: MS Dhoni: The Untold Story
1000164358.description: How did India get one of its favourite cricketers? Watch the life and struggles of MS Dhoni in his journey to become a respected sportsperson in this biopic.

1000238104.title: Rosogolla
1000238104.description: Tracing the life of Nobin Chandra Das, Bengal's legendary confectioner. Inspired by his beloved, the budding sweet maker invents Rosogulla, the iconic dessert.

1000239664.title: Aag Se Khelenge
1000239664.description: The film chronicles the life of MLA Vangaveeti Mohana Ranga from Vijayawada, who rose to power after his brother's murder and was assassinated in his prime.

1260005111.title: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar
1260005111.description: The father of the constitution of India, Babasaheb dedicated his life for the upliftment of others. Watch his contributions in shaping the new India.

1260009172.title: Super 30
1260009172.description: Based on the life of ace mathematician Anand Kumar, who trained 30 underprivileged students to crack one of the toughest entrance exams in India - IIT.

1260023303.title: Prothoma Kadambini
1260023303.description: From being an inquisitive child to becoming the first female practising doctor of British India, watch Kadambini Ganguly's inspiring story.

1260024907.title: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar
1260024907.description: A show dedicated to the life and works of the social reformer, leader of the downtrodden and father of the constitution of India, Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar.

1260029222.title: Ford v Ferrari
1260029222.description: Caroll Shelby and Ken Miles battle against all the odds to build a race car for Ford Motor Company and take on the dominant Ferraris at the Le Mans in 1966.

1260086810.description: Chronicling the historic 1983 Cricket World Cup, thirteen underdogs led by Kapil Dev fight and win against all odds to put India on the map.
1260086810.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Some Racial References

1260089815.title: Kaun Pravin Tambe?
1260089815.description: Relentless effort can make an underdog rise to the top, and cricketer Pravin Tambe's extraordinary journey proves why age is just a number.

1260102772.title: Main Aur Charles
1260102772.description: Charles was charming and charismatic but evil personified. Known as the bikini killer, he was the most wanted criminal. Inspired by true events.

1260122178.title: The Goddess
1260122178.description: The story of Patricia TeherÃ¡n and her great love, Ricardo Cabello, the man who led her to confront social prejudice, in love and on stage.

1770003314.title: MS Dhoni: The Untold Story
1770003314.description: A tell-all tale about the life and times of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, mapping his journey from a ticket collector to a celebrated sportsman.

1770005028.title: Sanju
1770005028.description: A heart-warming, real-life story of actor Sanjay Dutt's complicated relationships, his addictions and his endearing approach towards living life 'Dutt' size.
1770005028.crisp: Drug Use, Sexual References, Mild Language
1770005028.detail: Drug usage, Strong sexual references, Mild language

1770015481.title: Gour Hari Dastaan
1770015481.description: Based on the life of freedom fighter Gour Hari Das, he struggled against his own government to recognise his work and contribution to Indian history.
